EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Kristen, As a courtesy I just wanted to follow up with you on the email below. I received your information from Edmond Ray, would you be interested in learning about MBO Partners to see if our model is a good fit for your consulting business? If so, please schedule a convenient time for us to speak by using my online calendar. Thank you and have a great Memorial Day weekend! Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> Nicolette Taylor Sent: Thursday, April 12, 2012 5:10 PM To: kristenl@acutraksolutions.com Subject: MBO Partners Referral Dear Kristen, Hello, my name is Nicolette Taylor, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Edmond Ray. Edmond has enjoyed our program and thought it would be worthwhile for us to discuss MBO Services to see if it is something that you might find valuable. You can schedule a convenient time by using my online calendar. I look forward to speaking with you, Thank you,Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
